meta_title: AS 2550 Crane Maintenance Requirements Australia: The 2026 Guide
meta_description: Master AS 2550 compliance. Learn 10/25-year inspection rules, DWP calculations, and how Factory AI automates crane safety logs for audit-readiness.
title: AS 2550 Crane Maintenance Requirements in Australia: The Definitive Compliance Guide (2026 Edition)

hero_image.alt: Hero image for AS 2550 Crane Maintenance Requirements in Australia: The Definitive Compliance Guide (2026 Edition)

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality hero image inside a modern Australian manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a maintenance manager wearing a white hard hat, high-visibility vest, and safety glasses is looking up at a large yellow overhead gantry crane. The manager is holding a tablet (back of tablet visible only) as if checking a digital checklist. In the background, out of focus, other workers in PPE are operating machinery. The lighting is industrial but bright, highlighting the yellow crane against the steel structure of the roof. No text or overlays in the image. The atmosphere conveys safety, precision, and modern technology.
